title: Lorgnette, "Brooch", ca. 1890–1900
creditline: Gift of Charlotte Y. Salisbury in loving memory of her husband, Harrison E. Salisbury
description: Two glass lenses fold into silver case with floral relief decoration; suspension loop and ring at handle end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Lorgnette, "Brooch", ca. 1890–1900.
ca. 1890–1900. Silver, glass. Gift of Charlotte Y. Salisbury in loving memory of her husband, Harrison E. Salisbury. 1995-15-7.
